name: Rural Education, Women and Rural Development Service Foundation
briefDescription: The Rewards Foundation is committed to support poverty reduction and make all efforts to contribute to achieve the millennium development goal of halving absolute poverty in Asia and the Pacific region by 2015 in an environmentally sustainable and socially equitable manner. In line with this strategic thrust, all activities of the Rewards Foundation are being directed to the overarching objective of poverty reduction, including the balanced and sustainable use of natural resources. So our organisation contributes to the reduction of poverty in terms of improving the health status, educational level and environment upgradation of communities. The Foundation has so far served more than 2,000 people including women, youths and children.
